title: Deadly landslide hits Java island
description: A landslide swept through the Indonesian island of Java, killing two people and leaving 21 others missing. Several days of heavy rainfall triggered the natural disaster, which destroyed dozens of homes across three villages. #Indonesia #Javaisland #Javalandslide #heavyrainfall

title: Red wine and chocolate boost memory
description: Japanese scientists have discovered that bitter compounds found in red wine and cocoa can help boost memory function. The same compounds, also present in apples and berries, showed almost instant effects during memory testing conducted on mice. #memoryboost #redwine #chocolate

title: Bankstown Central bollard wrecks four cars
description: A new bollard installed at the entrance of Bankstown Central car park has caused four cars to be wrecked in just one afternoon. The video posted to social media has divided opinion between those who believe the pole isn't properly signposted and others who argue drivers need to be more observant. #Bankstown @bankstowncentral #pole #poleaccidents

title: Clover Moore reviews busking restrictions
description: Sydney Lord Mayor Clover Moore has announced a review of new busking restrictions following feedback from street performers and their supporters. The review aims to increase busking locations on George Street and extend performance times beyond the current one-hour limit. #busking #buskingrestrictions #CloverMoore

title: Rooftop cleaner rescued after chest injury in Yagoona
description: There's been a delicate rescue at Yagoona after a cleaner slipped on a rooftop, puncturing his chest with a high-pressure hose. #Yagoona #rescue #emergency #injury
